r.d: ev provides interface to libev library - high performance full-featured event loop written in C.
r.n: - Fixed build warnings with PHP 7.4.0-alpha1: 'incompatible pointer type' warnings occurred in assignments to the write property handlers (thanks to Remi Collet). - Re-fixed the Windows build errors related to errno in a way that the libev sources are left pristine. (The root of the issue is actually rooted in the PHP code where the errno macro is re-defined.)
